name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Apps by 123apps - Edit, Convert, Create

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost productivity with easy-to-use web apps for AI tools, PDF, and file conversion. Add 123apps extension to Chrome now!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Maximize your productivity with Web Apps by 123apps, the ultimate collection of easy-to-use online tools for editing, converting, and creating digital content. Whether you need to work with PDFs, audio files, videos, or documents, this extension brings powerful AI-enhanced utilities directly to your browser.

With Web Apps by 123apps, you can:

► Edit PDFs and Documents: Modify text, merge files, or split pages effortlessly.

► Convert Files Instantly: Convert PDFs, audio, video, and image formats in just a few clicks.

► AI-powered Tools: Leverage smart tools that simplify file management, audio processing, and more.

► Create Multimedia Projects: From video creation to audio trimming, manage your creative tasks seamlessly.

By adding this extension, you get quick access to a variety of high-quality tools designed to enhance your workflow—all within a simple, user-friendly interface. No downloads, no hassle—just efficient, cloud-based apps for all your editing and conversion needs.
